body_html:
@jass-singh @zhyj3038 Hello,

A fix: I would recommend that you useinference_type=FLOAT for the conversion. However, do change DetectorActivity.java file in the tensorflow/contrib/lite/examples/android/app/src/main/java as below:
private static final boolean TF_OD_API_IS_QUANTIZED = false; (It should be true by default).

After this save your file and try to build the apk. Let me know if it works :)

Cheers!!

body:
@jass-singh @zhyj3038 Hello,

A fix: I would recommend that you use`inference_type=FLOAT` for the conversion. However, do change DetectorActivity.java file in the tensorflow/contrib/lite/examples/android/app/src/main/java as below:
private static final boolean TF_OD_API_IS_QUANTIZED = false; (It should be true by default).

After this save your file and try to build the apk. Let me know if it works :)


Cheers!!
